dialogueSequence.sentence: Are you the ones rampaging through the capital?
Bark Bark (Rampaging is a strong word. I prefer liberating.)
Filthy swine, your reign of terror ends on the morrow!
That implies we let him live today.
Master, I cannot allow your avarice to surpass mine. You die here!
(I’ll attempt knock him out and have the people exile him. No slime will be shed today.)
Says a coward who can only block.
He will be the shield to your sword. Have at you!
Bark Woof (I won’t let them kill you.)
